116675.name: Aegis of Light
116675.text: Summon a random 1-Cost minion and give it Taunt. Imbue your Hero Power.
116675.flavorText: "Try scooching together! The arrows are getting through!"

113700.name: Aessina
113700.text: Battlecry: If 20 friendly minions have died this game, deal 20 damage split among all enemies. ( left!) (Ready!)
113700.flavorText: The Mother Wisp is a mysterious figure to most mortals, but to Ysera, she is a dear friend and companion.

114243.name: Afflicted Devastator
114243.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all other friendly minions. Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.

115203.name: Agamaggan
115203.text: Battlecry: The next card you play costs your OPPONENT'S Health instead of Mana (up to 10).
115203.flavorText: Though he fell during the War of the Ancients, his legacy on Azeroth can be seen in the flourishing quilboar tribes who still worship him.

115928.name: Alara'shi
115928.text: Battlecry: Transform minions in your hand into random Demons. (They keep their original stats and Cost.)
115928.flavorText: It's a bird! It's a plane! It's a bear! It's a felstalker! It's a doomguard! It's an imp!

115052.name: Amphibian's Spirit
115052.text: Give a minion +2/+2 and "Deathrattle: Give a friendly minion +2/+2 and this Deathrattle."

117302.name: Ancient of Yore
117302.text: Dormant for 2 turns. While Dormant, gain 5 Armor and draw a card at the end of your turn.

114533.name: Animated Moonwell
114533.text: After you cast a spell, gain Attack equal to its Cost.
114533.flavorText: Your spells are sure to make a splash!

115307.name: Archdruid of Thorns
115307.text: Battlecry: Gain the Deathrattles of your minions that died this turn.

114527.name: Ashamane
114527.text: Battlecry: Fill your hand with copies of cards from your opponent's deck. They cost (3) less.
114527.flavorText: In ancient times, Ashamane sacrificed herself to save night elves from the Legion’s wrath. Her name is still honored among their descendants.

114367.name: Aspect's Embrace
114367.flavorText: For when you really need a hug. Or to Imbue your Hero Power.

115264.name: Aviana, Elune's Chosen
115264.text: Battlecry: Start a three turn lunar cycle. When the Full Moon rises, your cards cost (1) this game.
115264.flavorText: The Mistress of Birds takes a special interest in all creatures of the sky, as well as those who have wings but have yet to fly.

114517.name: Barbed Thorn
114517.text: Choose One - Gain Poisonous this turn; or Gain "Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to all enemies."
114517.flavorText: Comes with a pack of bandages.

114346.name: Barkshield Sentinel
114346.text: Taunt After you use your Hero Power, gain +2 Health.
114346.flavorText: His bite is worse than his bark.

114280.name: Beanstalk Brute
114280.text: Battlecry: Give +4/+4 to the top 3 minions in your deck.
114280.flavorText: I know a guy who might be able to handle this for us. He's kind of a specialist.

114935.name: Bitterbloom Knight
114935.flavorText: Every rose has its thorn, beard, and shield.

115174.name: Bloodthistle Illusionist
115174.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this. One secretly dies when it takes damage.
115174.flavorText: Some people have imaginary friends. He has an imaginary twin.

114213.name: Briarspawn Drake
114213.text: At the end of your turn, attack a random enemy minion (excess damage hits the enemy hero).

114857.name: Broll Bearmantle
114857.text: After you cast a spell, summon a random Animal Companion.

114219.name: Brood Keeper
114219.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, equip a 2/2 Sword.
114219.flavorText: Mess with the brood, and you get the dude!

114215.name: Clutch of Corruption
114215.text: Choose a friendly Dragon. Summon a 0/2 Egg that hatches into a copy of it.

114306.name: Corpse Flower
114306.text: After your opponent summons a minion, spend 2 Corpses to deal 3 damage to it.
114306.flavorText: Sometimes it's better not to stop and smell the flowers.

115938.name: Critter Caretaker
115938.text: At the end of your turn, restore 3 Health to both heroes.
115938.flavorText: She teaches all her critters two things: heel and heal.

115867.name: Curious Cumulus
115867.text: At the end of your turn, give your hero Divine Shield.

114218.name: Darkrider
114218.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a Dragon with a Dark Gift.
114218.flavorText: Before the corruption spread to the Emerald Dream, he was known only by this: Rider.

115364.name: Daydreaming Pixie
115364.text: At the end of your turn, get a random Nature spell.

114844.name: Defiled Spear
114844.text: After your hero attacks an enemy, deal your hero's Attack damage to another random enemy.

114012.name: Divination
114012.text: Destroy a friendly Wisp to draw 3 cards.

114511.name: Dragonscale Armaments
114511.text: Draw a spell that started in your deck and one that didn't.
114511.flavorText: Why are dragons so good in the late game? 'Cause they scale!!!!

114663.name: Dreadsoul Corrupter
114663.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Summon a random Dormant Dreadseed.
114663.flavorText: Believe it or not, Dreadsouls aren't already corrupted.

114912.name: Dreambound Disciple
114912.text: Battlecry and Deathrattle: Your next Hero Power costs (0).
114912.flavorText: I'm not taking a nap, I'm just doing some extra studying about the Dream!

114933.name: Dreambound Raptor
114933.text: After you play a minion, give it a random Bonus Effect.
114933.flavorText: Dream, dream, dream, dream, dream, dreeeeeeeeam.

116674.artistName: L. Lullabi & I. Campelo da Silva
116674.name: Dreamwarden
116674.text: Taunt. Battlecry: If there is a card in your deck that didn't start there, draw it and gain +2/+2.

116293.name: Eggbasher
116293.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +4 Attack.
116293.flavorText: We could do this the over-easy way or the over-hard way.

114281.name: Emerald Bounty
114281.text: Draw 2 cards. You can't play them for 2 turns.

116495.name: Envoy of the Glade
116495.text: Battlecry: Transform all Neutral cards in your deck into random Druid ones.

115873.name: Evergreen Stag
115873.flavorText: Nevergreen Stag has Enrage, Overkill, and Honorable Kill.

114018.name: Exotic Houndmaster
114018.text: Battlecry: Draw a Beast. Imbue your Hero Power.
114018.flavorText: "Hi lil guy! Have a bite of Green, it's good for you!"

116672.name: Fae Trickster
116672.text: Deathrattle: Draw a spell that costs (5) or more.
116672.flavorText: Muahaha they'll never see this spell that costs (5) or more coming!!

114498.name: Ferocious Felbat
114498.text: Deathrattle: Resurrect a different friendly Deathrattle minion that costs (5) or more. Summon a copy of it.
114498.flavorText: A tree in the hand is worth two in the Nightmare.

114006.name: Flutterwing Guardian
114006.flavorText: Flutterwing in the skyyyyy, I can go twice as highhhhhh

114293.name: Forbidden Shrine
114293.text: Spend all your Mana. Cast a random spell that costs that much.
114293.flavorText: Telling me not to use something just makes me want to use it more.

113588.name: Forest Lord Cenarius
113588.text: Choose Thrice - Give your other minions +1/+3; or Summon a 5/5 Ancient with Taunt.
113588.flavorText: He handpicked Malfurion, and not Illidan, to become the first druid, therefore ensuring an endless cycle of sibling rivalry.

115033.name: Fractured Power
115033.text: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals. In 2 turns, gain two.
115033.flavorText: Look what Warlocks need just to mimic a fraction of our power!

114920.name: Glowroot Lure
114920.text: Taunt. Costs (1) less for each time you used your Hero Power this game.
114920.flavorText: You'd think this is a creation of the Emerald Nightmare, but you would be wrong.

114081.name: Goldpetal Drake
114081.flavorText: All that glitters is gold... Petal. Drake.

114254.name: Goldrinn
114254.flavorText: His relentless ferocity has made him well known among many peoples and by many names, including Lo’Gosh and the Great Wolf.

115058.name: Grace of the Greatwolf
115058.text: Choose One - Deal 4 damage to the enemy hero; or Summon two 3/2 Wolves with Rush.

114654.name: Grim Harvest
114654.text: Draw a card. Summon a random Dormant Dreadseed.
114654.flavorText: "Muahaha… This year's harvest was quite grim… just how I like it! Because I'm EVIL!"

114304.name: Grotesque Runeblade
114304.text: Battlecry: If the last card you played had an Unholy rune, gain +1 Attack. Repeat for Blood and +1 Durability.
114304.flavorText: Frost confirmed to be the least gross rune.

115809.name: Grove Shaper
115809.text: After you cast a Nature spell, summon a 2/2 Treant with "Deathrattle: Get a copy of that spell."

114858.name: Hamuul Runetotem
114858.text: Start of Game: If each spell in your deck is Nature, Imbue your Hero Power. Repeat this every 2 spells you cast.

115176.name: Harbinger of the Blighted
115176.text: Whenever this enters your hand from the battlefield, summon two random 2-Cost minions.
115176.flavorText: The more pretentious the name, the eviler the character.

114301.name: Hideous Husk
114301.text: Your Leeches steal 2 more Health from their victims. Battlecry: Summon two 0/2 Leeches.
114301.flavorText: This is what's known as a zombiotic relationship.

113328.name: Hopeful Dryad
113328.flavorText: "I hope this dragon doesn't eat me when it grows up."

115080.name: Horn of Plenty
115080.text: Discover a Nature spell. It costs (2) less.
115080.flavorText: Don't be silly, there's never been a cornucopia in the art.

117498.name: Hungering Ancient
117498.text: At the end of your turn, eat a minion in your deck and gain its stats. Deathrattle: Add them to your hand.
117498.flavorText: This guy puts the horror in horrorticulture.

114884.name: Illusory Greenwing
114884.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Shuffle two 4/5 Dragons with Taunt into your deck. They're Summoned When Drawn.
114884.flavorText: "MORE LIKE, A LOSER-Y GREENWING! MUAHAHA!" - Nightmare Lord Xavius

114305.name: Infested Breath
114305.flavorText: Remember to brush your tongue as well as your teeth.

114337.name: Jumpscare!
114337.text: Discover a Demon that costs (5) or more with a Dark Gift. Shuffle the other two into your deck.
114337.flavorText: Might need a pair of [Druidic Pants of Water Resistance] after this one.

115461.name: Kaldorei Priestess
115461.text: Battlecry: Give all enemy minions -2 Attack until your next turn. Imbue your Hero Power.
115461.flavorText: Elune, I implore you... bless my game with good rng, so that I may achieve Legend with a 100% winrate.

116667.name: Lightmender
116667.text: Taunt. Choose One - +3 Attack and Divine Shield; or +3 Health and Lifesteal.
116667.flavorText: How many lightmenders does it take to mend a lightorb?

114289.name: Living Garden
114289.text: Battlecry: Imbue your Hero Power. Reduce the Cost of a minion in your hand by (1).

114080.name: Lunarwing Messenger
114080.flavorText: Back in my day this is how we got friend requests.

115186.name: Malorne the Waywatcher
115186.text: Battlecry: Discover a Legendary Wild God. If you've Imbued your Hero Power 4 times, set its Cost to (1).
115186.flavorText: A figure of legend and myth, Malorne is one of the oldest of the Wild Gods and father to Cenarius himself.

114630.name: Mark of Ursol
114630.text: Choose a minion. If it's an enemy, set its stats to 1/1. If it's friendly, set its stats to 3/3 instead.

117511.name: Meadowstrider
117511.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Put a Meadowstrider on the bottom of your deck. It costs (1).
117511.flavorText: Pwease stop meadowing in my affaiws.

114284.name: Merithra
114284.text: Battlecry: Resurrect all different friendly minions that cost (8) or more.
114284.flavorText: The green dragon flight was always a Merithracracy.

115805.name: Merry Moonkin
115805.text: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Armor. Repeat for each Wisp you control.

114508.name: Mimicry
114508.text: Your opponent draws 2 cards. You get copies of them.

116296.name: Monstrous Mosquito
116296.text: At the end of your turn, give your other minions +1 Attack.
116296.flavorText: I know every creature is valuable in the ecosystem of life. But these guys SUCK.

114627.name: Moonwell
114627.text: Deal 4 damage to all enemy characters. Restore 4 Health to all friendly characters.
114627.flavorText: Everyone always asks what the moonwell is but how come no one ever asks how well the moon is?

114967.name: Morbid Swarm
114967.text: Choose One - Summon two 1/1 Ants; or Spend 2 Corpses to deal 4 damage to a minion.
114967.flavorText: Death Knights are masters of death who use shadow magic to control swarms of... ants?

114298.name: Mythical Runebear
114298.text: Taunt. Battlecry: If this has 4 or more Attack, summon a copy of this.
114298.flavorText: The eyes have it: that's a Runebear.

114496.name: Nightmare Dragonkin
114496.text: Deathrattle: Reduce the Cost of the right-most card in your hand by (2).

115088.name: Nightmare Fuel
115088.text: Discover a copy of a minion in your opponent's deck. Combo: With a Dark Gift.
115088.flavorText: Every instance of "but not less than (1)" has been replaced with "but not more than (1)."

115139.name: Nightmare Lord Xavius
115139.text: Battlecry: Discover a minion from your deck. Give it a Dark Gift.
115139.flavorText: Xavius will also be replacing Illidan as the Demon Hunter hero in an upcoming patch.

114307.name: Nythendra
114307.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Split into 1/1 Beetles. At the start of your turn, reform with any remaining.
114307.flavorText: Bug Report: Minion split into 1/1 Beetles and then reformed at the start of next turn.

113434.name: Ohn'ahra
113434.text: At the end of your turn, play the top 3 cards from your deck.
113434.flavorText: Revered by the tauren and centaur, Ohn’ara’s power over wind remains an inspiration to many.

113606.name: Omen
113606.text: Rush, Windfury Deathrattle: Deal damage to all enemies. (Improves after this attacks!)
113606.flavorText: His tremendous wisdom could not survive the foul influence of the demons’ fel magic during the War of the Ancients. But his blessing from Elune did.

116660.name: Ominous Nightmares
116660.text: Choose One - Deal 1 damage to all minions; or Give a damaged minion +2/+2.
116660.flavorText: Everyone keeps talking about nightmares, but I don't see any horses?

118250.name: Overgrown Horror
118250.text: Taunt Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of minions in your hand with Dark Gifts by (2).
118250.flavorText: Fetch me the garden shears. The BIG shears.

115191.name: Petal Peddler
115191.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly Dragon +1/+1.
115191.flavorText: The Emerald Nightmare might actually be a good thing for her business.

114914.name: Photosynthesis
114914.text: Restore 6 Health. Get 3 random Druid spells.
114914.flavorText: Nothing beats some time relaxing in the sun with a pile of good mulch.

115295.name: Plucky Podling
115295.text: If this would transform into a minion, it transforms into one that costs (2) more.
115295.flavorText: "When I grow up I wanna be a Deathwing!"

114287.name: Q'onzu
114287.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Choose to keep it or put it on top of your opponent's deck.
114287.flavorText: "Where did Sarge go? Anyone seen Sarge?" - Harth

114497.name: Ravenous Felhunter
114497.text: Deathrattle: Resurrect a friendly Deathrattle minion that costs (4) or less. Summon a copy of it.

114848.name: Reforestation
114848.text: Choose One - Draw a spell; or Draw a minion. (Hold this for (turn, turns) to do both!)

114543.artistName: L. Lullabi & I. Campelo da Silva
114543.name: Renewing Flames
114543.text: Lifesteal. Deal 5 damage to the lowest Health enemy, twice.

114518.name: Renferal, the Malignant
114518.text: Battlecry: Trap random (card, cards) in your opponent's hand for a turn. (Improved for each time you've played this.)

114076.name: Resplendent Dreamweaver
114076.text: Battlecry: If you've Imbued your Hero Power twice, deal 5 damage to a minion.
114076.flavorText: Have you ever had a dream that that you um you had you'd you would you could you'd do you wi you wants you you could do so you you'd do you could you you want so much you could do anything?

114303.name: Rite of Atrocity
114303.text: Discover an Undead. Spend 2 Corpses to give it a Dark Gift.
114303.flavorText: Turns out 2 Atrocities do make a Rite!

114300.name: Ritual of the New Moon
114300.text: Summon two random 3-Cost minions. (Cast (spell, spells) to summon 6-Cost minions instead.)
114300.flavorText: This ritual does nothing, but they do it anyway for the social connection.

115039.name: Rotheart Dryad
115039.text: Deathrattle: Draw a minion that costs (7) or more.
115039.flavorText: Rot through the heart and Xavius is to blame!

115025.name: Rotten Apple
115025.text: Restore 12 Health to your hero. For the next 2 turns, deal 3 damage to your hero.
115025.flavorText: The rotten apple doesn't fall far from the corrupted world tree.

115037.name: Scavenging Flytrap
115037.text: After a minion dies, gain its Attack.

115041.name: Scorching Observer
115041.flavorText: We get it, you're mad that you only have one eye. But that's no excuse to burn down the entire Emerald Dream.

114308.name: Selenic Drake
114308.text: Elusive At the end of your turn, get a random Dragon.
114308.flavorText: Shouldn't this have like, a thousand times more attack?

114514.name: Shadowcloaked Assailant
114514.text: Battlecry: If you're holding one of the same cards as your opponent, shuffle theirs into their deck.

115090.name: Shaladrassil
115090.text: Get all 5 Dream cards. If you've played a higher Cost card while holding this, corrupt them!
115090.flavorText: Wow, that Nightmare-B-Gone spray really works! Too bad we didn't have enough for the whole tree.

113568.name: Shepherd's Crook
113568.text: After your hero attacks, summon a 3/3 Sheep that's Dormant for 2 turns.

116684.name: Siphoning Growth
116684.text: Destroy a friendly minion to gain 8 Armor.
116684.flavorText: No thanks. This one's all yours, bud.

115215.name: Sleep Paralysis
115215.text: Choose One - Summon two 3/6 Demons with Taunt that can't attack; or Destroy an enemy minion.
115215.flavorText: The wild SPRITE is paralyzed! It can't sleep!

114344.name: Slumbering Sprite
114344.text: Starts Dormant. After you use your Hero Power, this awakens.
114344.flavorText: Careful, sometimes he punches and screams when he wakes up.

116977.name: Spark of Life
116977.text: Choose One - Discover a Mage spell; or Discover a Druid spell.
116977.flavorText: Just don't spark that life too close to the World Tree.

115055.name: Spirit Bond
115055.text: Deal 3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, summon a 3/2 Wolf with Rush.

116462.name: Spirit Gatherer
116462.text: Battlecry: Get a Wisp. Imbue your Hero Power.
116462.flavorText: They call him the Wisp Whisperer.

114369.name: Spirits of the Forest
114369.text: Choose One - Summon three 2/3 Wolves with Taunt; or Summon two 4/3 Falcons with Windfury.

115652.name: Sporegnasher
115652.text: Poisonous Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy minion.

115866.name: Starsurge
115866.text: Deal damage to a minion. (Improved by each friendly minion that died this game.)

116980.name: Stellar Balance
116980.text: Get a Moonfire and a Starfire. Give them Spell Damage +1.
116980.flavorText: Famously, Moonfire and Starfire are about equal in power.

114217.artistName: L. Lullabi & I. Campelo da Silva
114217.name: Succumb to Madness
114217.text: Discover a friendly Dragon that died this game. Resummon it.

115876.name: Symbiosis
115876.text: Discover a Choose One card from another class.

114544.name: Toreth the Unbreaking
114544.text: Divine Shield, Taunt Your Divine Shields take three hits to break.
114544.flavorText: Toreth took Bubble Hearth extra seriously.

116673.name: Tormented Dreadwing
116673.text: Deathrattle: Draw 2 Dragons. Reduce their Costs by (1).
116673.flavorText: People say you can't see clearly through corruption, but you have more eyes than ever!

114353.name: Tortolla
114353.text: Taunt, Elusive After this takes damage, gain 1 Armor and give this minion +1 Attack.
114353.flavorText: Tortolla survived the Burning Legion’s invasion unscathed, but the Nightmare’s corruption really got under his shell.

116292.name: Tranquil Treant
116292.text: Deathrattle: Both players gain an empty Mana Crystal.
116292.flavorText: "Cut down my trunk and make a Mana Crystal," said the tree. "Then you can ramp away... and be happy."

113822.name: Treacherous Tormentor
113822.flavorText: He's so mean, he leaves you on red.

114505.name: Tricky Satyr
114505.text: Battlecry: Get a copy of the lowest Cost card in your opponent's hand.
114505.flavorText: Silly Satyr, tricks are for whelps!

114310.name: Twilight Influence
114310.text: Choose One - Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack; or Summon a random 2-Cost minion.

115027.name: Twisted Treant
115027.text: Deathrattle: Give a random minion in each player's hand -2 Attack.
115027.flavorText: You twist me right round baby right round like a treant baby right round round round

115612.name: Twisted Webweaver
115612.text: Whenever you play another minion you've already played, draw a card.
115612.flavorText: This spider is so evil that it catches things in its web and EATS them!

114357.name: Typhoon
114357.text: Each minion gets shuffled into a random player's deck.
114357.flavorText: I gotta go Julia, we got satyrs.

114326.name: Tyrande
114326.text: Battlecry: The next 3 spells you play cast twice.
114326.flavorText: High Priestess of the Moon Goddess, Tyrande has journeyed into the Emerald Dream to find Malfurion. Discovering Xavius’s nightmarish influence, she is determined to thwart those seeking to corrupt it.

114020.name: Umbraclaw
114020.flavorText: Umbraclaws of a feather hibernate together.

114632.name: Ursine Maul
114632.text: After your hero attacks, draw your highest Cost card.
114632.flavorText: Buy all the bears at the Ursine Mall!

116018.name: Ursoc
116018.text: Battlecry: Attack ALL other minions. Deathrattle: Resurrect any this killed.
116018.flavorText: The great bear lord was so mighty that the Nightmare could only corrupt his spirit, not his strength.

114868.name: Ursol
114868.text: Battlecry: Cast the highest Cost spell from your hand as an Aura that lasts turns.
114868.flavorText: Twin of Ursoc, they were inseparable until death drove Ursoc’s spirit to corruption, while Ursol’s remained at peace.

113371.name: Verdant Dreamsaber
113371.text: Battlecry: If this costs (3) or less, attack two random enemy minions.
113371.flavorText: Hey, at least the card frame is verdant.

115044.name: Wallow, the Wretched
115044.text: While this is in your hand or deck, it gains a copy of every Dark Gift given to your minions.
115044.flavorText: Their hairdo is anything BUT wretched.

110889.name: Ward of Earth
110889.text: Gain 5 Armor. Summon a random 5-Cost minion and give it Taunt.

114373.name: Weaver of the Cycle
114373.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a spell that costs (5) or more, deal 3 damage.

114510.name: Web of Deception
114510.text: Return a friendly minion to your hand to summon a 4/4 Spider with Stealth.
114510.flavorText: You sit on a web of LIES!

114299.name: Wish of the New Moon
114299.text: Deal 6 damage to a minion. (Cast (spell, spells) to gain Lifesteal.)
114299.flavorText: Because wishing upon a star was soooo last expansion.

114292.name: Wisprider
114292.text: Battlecry: Imbue your Hero Power, then trigger it.

115198.name: Wyvern's Slumber
115198.text: Choose One - Summon two Dormant Dreadseeds; or Deal 2 damage to all minions.
115198.flavorText: But watch, as soon as you try to go to sleep it'll be running all around the house making a bunch of noise.

113321.name: Ysera, Emerald Aspect
113321.text: Start of Game: Increase both players'maximum Mana by 5. Battlecry: Gain 3 Mana Crystals.
113321.flavorText: She was previously Yuhsera, with a ‘yuh’.

114340.name: Ysondre
114340.text: Taunt. Deathrattle: Summon a random Dragon for each time Ysondre has died this game.
